name: Neurological AE Escalation to Partner
description: For the partnered Parkinson's study (BIIB122/DNL151), this workflow filters incoming AE reports for specific neurological events and forwards them to the Biogen safety contact and internal medical monitor.

actions.description: Scan incoming AE report for neurological keywords and forward to the Biogen safety lead and Denali medical monitor.
Send an automated acknowledgment to the reporting site confirming receipt of the AE.

name: Site Activation Packet Distribution
description: Upon internal confirmation of a new site selection, this workflow automatically sends the startup document packet and a welcome email to the new Principal Investigator and Study Coordinator.

actions.description: Email the standard site startup document packet to the PI and Coordinator at the newly selected site.

name: BBB Imaging Result Triage
description: Processes incoming brain imaging results from a central vendor to check for confirmation of Transport Vehicle target engagement. Notifies the Clinical Scientist of positive results.

actions.description: Review imaging report for 'positive uptake' and forward to the study's Clinical Scientist for review.
If the report does not show positive uptake, automatically file the result in the eTMF.

name: Patient Advocacy Inquiry Routing
description: Monitors the clinical-trials@dnli.com inbox for messages from patient advocacy groups and routes them to the appropriate internal liaison for a personalized response.

actions.description: Forward email from known patient advocacy groups to the Patient Advocacy department lead.
Send an automated reply to the sender confirming their message has been routed to the correct team.

name: DNL310 Low IMP Stock Alert
description: Monitors site inventory reports for the DNL310 (Hunter syndrome) study and alerts the clinical supply manager when a site's drug stock falls below the predefined threshold.

actions.action: Alert Supply Manager of Low Stock
actions.description: If an inventory report shows stock is below threshold, send an urgent notification to the Clinical Supply Manager.
